post:
Here is our next offer for dedicated servers.
This time we have an <a href="https://www.fitvps.com/members/cart.php?a=add&pid=24">dual core Ivy Bridge</a> from $30 / month  

Also there is a dual core Intel Haswell, some other Atoms, an AMD E240, etc. - all configurations can be seen <a href="https://www.fitvps.com/members/cart.php?gid=2">Here</a>

For those that don't remember the <a href="http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/10468/atom-n2800-dedicated-servers-from-25-month">Previous offer</a> and <a href="http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/8926/dual-core-4-threads-1-86ghz-atom-n2800-with-4gb-ram-from-25-month">Other previous offer</a>, here is a short summary / FAQ

Server Location: <a href="http://goo.gl/maps/wWd74">Varna, Bulgaria</a>

Some background: Company name Telecoms Ltd., registered in it's current form since 1998. Company Reg. No 103282011, EU VAT number BG103282011. We are operating our own network - AS16154. RIPE LIR since 2000. Our main business is ISP.

Test IP - https://www.fitvps.com/test-ip/

Looking glass - http://lg.fitvps.com

All dedicated servers are currently offered with 1 or 5 free IPs. If you choose the 5 free IPs option, a subnet will be assigned to you in the RIPE databse, which means your named and other details will be visible in the whois for the IPs. Sorry, there is no privacy option for the RIPE database.

If you like one of these servers, please PM me.

If you have any questions, please ask.
